desc.name: duration
desc.desc: number of seconds to mute the TRXVU

id.desc: get the beacon interval time in seconds
set the beacon interval time in seconds

desc.name: seconds
desc.desc: number of seconds for beacon interval

desc.name: duration
desc.desc: idle duration time (max 10 minutes) apply only for state ON

desc.name: dump_type
desc.desc: the type of the dump

desc.name: start time
desc.desc: start time in unix time

desc.name: end time
desc.desc: end time in unix time

desc.name: seconds
desc.desc: seconds of the minute

desc.name: minutes
desc.desc: minutes of the hour

desc.name: hours
desc.desc: hour of the start day

desc.name: day
desc.desc: Day of the week (Sunday=1, Monday=2, ..., Saturday=7)

desc.name: date
desc.desc: Date of the month.

desc.name: month
desc.desc: Month of the year (January = 1)

desc.name: year
desc.desc: Year since 2000 (2000 = 0)

desc.name: secondsOfYear
desc.desc: number of seconds since the start of the year

desc.name: number of days
desc.desc: number of days to get add in the dump (0 will get only the asked day)

id.desc: get the bitrate of the trxvu
set the bitrate of the trxvu

desc.name: bitrate
desc.desc: the bitrate we want to set in the trxvu (1200 - 00 \ 2400 - 01 \ 4800 - 02 \ 9600 - 03

id.desc: get how much time the satellite is on
get how much time the satellite is on?
get how much commands do the satellite needs to do now
get the status of one side in the antenna

desc.name: ant side
desc.desc: what side we want to know the status (side A - 00 \ side B - 01)

id.desc: set the status of one side in the antenna

desc.name: ant side
desc.desc: what side we want to change the status (side A - 00 \ side B - 01)

desc.name: status
desc.desc: what status we want the antenna side to be (disarm = 172 \ arm = 173)

id.desc: get the UPTIME of one side in the antenna

desc.name: ant side
desc.desc: what side we want to know the UPTIME (side A - 00 \ side B - 01)

id.desc: cancel the deployment of one side in the antenna

desc.name: ant side
desc.desc: what side we want to cancel the deployment (side A - 00 \ side B - 01)

id.desc: restart the OBC with the EPS
restart the OBC with the EPS
